She feels her mom can text her and say whatever she wants but that's not good going to change the fact that she hasn't been supportive at all and she can't be. She doesn't feel like she can talk to her and in the past her mom has tried to stay, to say things and be nice and sort of.

She doesn't know why she wouldn't just pick up the phone and call and leave a voicemail if she doesn't answer or just take that chance and then her mom just sends me a text message because it's easier.
She feels like yeah, she's trying to be nice, but it's also sort of just a cop-out because she's just texting.
